verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
God can do anything
with anything

He can heal any hurt,
any suffering

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Every cross, every care, every burden He'll bare

For anyone, anywhere,
God can do anything

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
He's hope to the hopeless
And a sight to the blind

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He makes impossible, possible
When there's no other way
He makes the blackest sin, white as snow

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
The fairest of ten thousand
My soon coming King

Jehovah, Messiah
The reason why I sing

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He's Alpha and Omega
The Beginning and the End

My Savior and Redeemer
He's my closest friend

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Every cross, every care,
every burden He'll bare

For anyone, anywhere,
God can do anything
